### Recent Releases

<!-- RECENT_RELEASES -->
<ul>
<li>
  <strong>2026-02-14</strong> – <a href="https://github.com/insin/control-panel-for-youtube">control-panel-for-youtube</a> <a href="https://github.com/insin/control-panel-for-youtube/releases/tag/v1.31.3">v1.31.3</a>
  <div><em>Browser extension which gives you more control over YouTube by adding missing options and UI improvements - for desktop &amp; mobile browsers</em></div>
  <details><summary>v1.31.3 release notes</summary><p>Visit the <a href="https://soitis.dev/control-panel-for-youtube" rel="nofollow">Control Panel for YouTube website</a> for installation links, more information about the extension, and FAQs (mostly about Safari).</p>
<p>Follow <a href="https://bsky.app/profile/soitis.dev" rel="nofollow">@soitis.dev</a> on Bluesky or <a href="https://twitter.com/ControlPanelFT" rel="nofollow">@ControlPanelFT</a> on Twitter for updates.</p>
<h2>Changes</h2>
<div class="markdown-alert markdown-alert-note"><p class="markdown-alert-title"><svg class="octicon octicon-info mr-2" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1 1 16 0A8 8 0 0 1 0 8Zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5 0 1 0 0 13 6.5 6.5 0 0 0 0-13ZM6.5 7.75A.75.75 0 0 1 7.25 7h1a.75.75 0 0 1 .75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.5h-2a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75ZM8 6a1 1 0 1 1 0-2 1 1 0 0 1 0 2Z"></path></svg>Note</p><p><strong>More of Control Panel for YouTube's options are now enabled by default</strong></p>
<p>Default options now include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Making more room for regular videos by hiding stream VODs, Mixes, Members only and Upcoming videos, and low-view videos in Related</li>
<li>Increasing the number of videos visible at once in Home, Subscriptions, and Search</li>
<li>Hiding non-essential UI elements which add clutter, tidying the sidebar on desktop, fixing common UI annoyances, and reverting weird UI changes YouTube makes</li>
</ul>
<p>Any options you've already manually configured will not be affected by this change</p>
</div>
<h3>New</h3>
<ul>
<li>Added install and significant update pages to the website for with information about the new default options, with instructions on how to open and pin the options popup</li>
<li>Added new Auto +1/+2/+3 options to Grid items per row which shows 1, 2 or 3 more thumbnails than YouTube natively wants to show in grids on desktop, or 1 more thumbnail when YouTube wants to display 1 or 2</li>
<li>Added an option to display the Home grid as a list</li>
<li>Added an option to animate removing videos which were hidden using YouTube's built-in Hide/Not interested/Don't recommend channel functionality on desktop (enabled by default unless your device is configured for reduced motion)</li>
<li>Added an option to hide the "Experiencing interruptions?" popup - if it's not being hidden, we make the popup message more accurate and hide the link about turning off your adblocker instead</li>
<li>Added an option to fix YouTube's grid loading placeholders and spinner in Home and Subscriptions on desktop so they match thumbnail size, flow correctly, only one row's worth of placeholders, and the spinner  always appears below the rest of the grid</li>
</ul>
<h3>Changed</h3>
<ul>
<li>Disabling themed hover effects now also applies to the Subscriptions page on desktop</li>
<li>Hide video metadata now also hides clutter in the full screen description panel on desktop</li>
<li>Restored the default touch response colours when disabling themed hover effects</li>
<li>Changed the Chinese version of the extension name to be more explicitly "for YouTube"</li>
<li>Enabled Hide Premium upsells by default, but made it do nothing for Premium users</li>
</ul>
<h3>Fixed</h3>
<ul>
<li>Fixed ads not being blocked on /watch pages which have been left open for a long time</li>
<li>Fixed reverting the Related sidebar to its old width and min-width on desktop</li>
<li>Fixed how list view handles the Shorts shelf, the legacy video renderer for Movies &amp; TV videos, and items which don't have a channel avatar or channel link</li>
<li>Fixed certain desktop menus not being detected the first time they're opened in the current tab, e.g. the video menu in Home which we add Hide channel to</li>
<li>Fixed Automatically pause channel trailers pausing if you try to manually play the trailer after the Featured tab loads</li>
<li>Fixed an error when the Save menu is opened on a /watch page</li>
<li>Fixed a bunch of potential future crashes where we were assuming an element will exist</li>
<li>Fixed Hide "More videos" in full screen hiding the new default end screen videos outside of full screen</li>
<li>Fixed Hide video endscreen content hiding "More videos" content in full screen</li>
</ul>
<h3>Removed</h3>
<ul>
<li>Removed the New video player UI → Always use compact play button option, as YouTube seems to have removed the giant play button</li>
</ul>
<h2>Availability (1/5)</h2>
<p>New versions have to be reviewed and approved for each browser before they're available to install or upgrade to.</p>
<p>This version is available for the following browsers:</p>
<p><a href="https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/control-panel-for-youtube/lodcanccmfbpjjpnngindkkmiehimile" title="Chrome and Chromium-based browsers" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/307584913-08b44d7b-61d5-49f2-9a76-607eb36fe407.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvMzA3NTg0OTEzLTA4YjQ0ZDdiLTYxZDUtNDlmMi05YTc2LTYwN2ViMzZmZTQwNy5wbmc_.I8VRlTfvrdMpGfE1j3i6uJM_HfGnH7DSY_kbPLRv6NQ" alt="Chrome and Chromium-based browsers" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" secured-asset-link="" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>

<h2>Screenshots</h2>
<h3>New Auto +1/+2/+3 options for grid items per row</h3>
<p>These options allow you to have more items per row while still scaling down at smaller window sizes</p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549892691-dc836b08-1493-4d2a-bce9-268b03621635.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkyNjkxLWRjODM2YjA4LTE0OTMtNGQyYS1iY2U5LTI2OGIwMzYyMTYzNS5wbmc_.1ZmKJQnPcAsCaGZF18LyFJSqV_mWDx5DhVyNzoMJq8I"><img width="402" height="432" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549892691-dc836b08-1493-4d2a-bce9-268b03621635.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkyNjkxLWRjODM2YjA4LTE0OTMtNGQyYS1iY2U5LTI2OGIwMzYyMTYzNS5wbmc_.1ZmKJQnPcAsCaGZF18LyFJSqV_mWDx5DhVyNzoMJq8I" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 432px;"></a>

<h3>Removing Hidden / Not interested videos is now animated by default (unless you have a reduced motion preference active)</h3>
<p>If multiple items are hidden at once, the animation is delayed until the last item's Undo timer finishes</p>
<details open="" class="details-reset border rounded-2">
  <summary class="px-3 py-2">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-device-camera-video">

<h3>Fixed YouTube's Home and Subscriptions grid loading UI on desktop</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th align="center">Before</th>
<th align="center">After</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="center"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549892290-88e21a4f-075c-468a-985a-36518e48c72d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkyMjkwLTg4ZTIxYTRmLTA3NWMtNDY4YS05ODVhLTM2NTE4ZTQ4YzcyZC5wbmc_.YtfJxw_dEU-xcebwePZUsEynj0NL-xuC-r7MrH_wwZE"><img width="1524" height="749" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549892290-88e21a4f-075c-468a-985a-36518e48c72d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkyMjkwLTg4ZTIxYTRmLTA3NWMtNDY4YS05ODVhLTM2NTE4ZTQ4YzcyZC5wbmc_.YtfJxw_dEU-xcebwePZUsEynj0NL-xuC-r7MrH_wwZE" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 749px;"></a></td>

</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Made the "Experiencing interruptions?" popup more accurate</h3>
<p>If you don't use the new option to hide the popup (we personally find the popup reassuring, and it's nice to have something to look at), we make its message more accurate</p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893234-78b312c7-b7a0-45e6-b3a5-d41782807410.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzMjM0LTc4YjMxMmM3LWI3YTAtNDVlNi1iM2E1LWQ0MTc4MjgwNzQxMC5wbmc_.1IolhRubvtorcXqEC-ouWSQxYKBGQCd_ekZaLARN2EA"><img width="320" height="87" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893234-78b312c7-b7a0-45e6-b3a5-d41782807410.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzMjM0LTc4YjMxMmM3LWI3YTAtNDVlNi1iM2E1LWQ0MTc4MjgwNzQxMC5wbmc_.1IolhRubvtorcXqEC-ouWSQxYKBGQCd_ekZaLARN2EA" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 87px;"></a>
<h3>Display the Home feed as a list</h3>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893587-e469cddd-a0bc-45eb-99e8-78414bc63545.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzNTg3LWU0NjljZGRkLWEwYmMtNDVlYi05OWU4LTc4NDE0YmM2MzU0NS5wbmc_.RIWTVp2OtL83TWO0x5dsYfQ2B_pzjkKvZc9jJU_GuzI"><img width="1539" height="927" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893587-e469cddd-a0bc-45eb-99e8-78414bc63545.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzNTg3LWU0NjljZGRkLWEwYmMtNDVlYi05OWU4LTc4NDE0YmM2MzU0NS5wbmc_.RIWTVp2OtL83TWO0x5dsYfQ2B_pzjkKvZc9jJU_GuzI" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 927px;"></a>
<p>We've also made fixes and improvements to how other items appear in list view, e.g. the Shorts shelf is now more compact if you're not hiding Shorts:</p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893642-ef23a0f7-fd69-45eb-b9ec-06e65b44d9e1.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzNjQyLWVmMjNhMGY3LWZkNjktNDVlYi1iOWVjLTA2ZTY1YjQ0ZDllMS5wbmc_.whUs78x1a9iM8akc1Pq_3XklGZT_qhYS5-sppnWb9ss"><img width="1539" height="927" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/549893642-ef23a0f7-fd69-45eb-b9ec-06e65b44d9e1.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNTQ5ODkzNjQyLWVmMjNhMGY3LWZkNjktNDVlYi1iOWVjLTA2ZTY1YjQ0ZDllMS5wbmc_.whUs78x1a9iM8akc1Pq_3XklGZT_qhYS5-sppnWb9ss" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 927px;"></a>

<li>
  <strong>2026-02-12</strong> – <a href="https://github.com/insin/control-panel-for-twitter">control-panel-for-twitter</a> <a href="https://github.com/insin/control-panel-for-twitter/releases/tag/v4.22.0">v4.22.0</a>
  <div><em>Browser extension which gives you more control over your Twitter timeline and adds missing features and UI improvements - for desktop and mobile</em></div>
  <details><summary>v4.22.0 release notes</summary><p>Visit the <a href="https://soitis.dev/control-panel-for-twitter" rel="nofollow">Control Panel for Twitter website</a> for installation links, more information about the extension, and FAQs (mostly about why Safari is so weird about extensions).</p>
<p>Follow <a href="https://twitter.com/ControlPanelFT" rel="nofollow">@ControlPanelFT</a> on Twitter or <a href="https://bsky.app/profile/soitis.dev" rel="nofollow">@soitis.dev</a> on Bluesky for updates.</p>
<h2>Changes</h2>
<ul>
<li>Added a Dark mode theme option to let you keep using the Dim theme, which was removed by X</li>
<li>Fixed detecting the theme change when toggling High Contrast mode changes the body background colour</li>
<li>Removed the <code>body.Dim</code> styling hook now that the Dim theme has been removed</li>
</ul>
<p>Selectors for theming are currently hardcoded based on normal and high constrast Lights out - we have improvements to theming coming in Control Panel for Twitter v5 which should make this less brittle.</p>
<h2>Availability (3/5)</h2>
<p>New versions have to be reviewed and approved for each browser before they're available to install or upgrade to.</p>
<p>This version is available for the following browsers:</p>
<p><a href="https://apps.apple.com/app/id1668516167?platform=mac" title="Safari on macOS" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/407980194-5521baec-f246-4a91-9615-ef602e3743b5.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzEyNjI1OTksIm5iZiI6MTc3MTI2MjI5OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8yMjY2OTIvNDA3OTgwMTk0LTU1MjFiYWVjLWYyNDYtNGE5MS05NjE1LWVmNjAyZTM3NDNiNS5wbmc_.s70EfCmiOMSTdFLYGyQsGKDFnq5Nki2yTLyuPSFMPdU" alt="Safari on macOS)" content-type-secured-asset="image/png" secured-asset-link="" style="max-width: 100%;"></a> <a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/control-panel-for-twitter/foccddlibbeccjiobcnakipdpkjiijjp" title="Edge and Edge Canary on Android" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/212897573-34b1af0a-dc5a-4aa2-a1e7-ca85d3823f9f.png" alt="Edge and Edge Canary on Android" style="max-width: 100%;"></a> <a href="https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/control-panel-for-twitter/kpmjjdhbcfebfjgdnpjagcndoelnidfj" title="Google Chrome and Chromium-based browsers" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/226692/212897023-9e66b1b0-e1cd-44df-a4f2-3d5bda80c5f8.png" alt="Google Chrome and Chromium-based browsers" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>

<li>
  <strong>2026-02-04</strong> – <a href="https://github.com/insin/ai-overview-hider-for-google">ai-overview-hider-for-google</a> <a href="https://github.com/insin/ai-overview-hider-for-google/releases/tag/v1.0.10">v1.0.10</a>
  <div><em>Browser extension which hides the AI Overview section in Google search results on desktop and mobile browsers</em></div>
  <details><summary>v1.0.10 release notes</summary><p>Visit the <a href="https://soitis.dev/ai-overview-hider-for-google" rel="nofollow">AI Overview Hider for Google website</a> for installation links, more information about the extension, and FAQs.</p>
<p>Follow <a href="https://bsky.app/profile/soitis.dev" rel="nofollow">@soitis.dev</a> on Bluesky for updates.</p>
<h2>Changes</h2>
<ul>
<li>Added a faster but more brittle way to hide AI Overviews on desktop, which should prevent most brief flashes of AI Overviews which appear at the top of the search results (with existing slower methods as a fallback)</li>
<li>Removed restoring vertical space when a top of search result AI Overview is hidden on desktop (no longer needed)</li>
</ul>
<h2>Availability (5/5)</h2>

<p>This version is available for the following browsers:</p>

  <strong>2026-01-13</strong> – <a href="https://github.com/insin/astro-lazy-youtube-embed">astro-lazy-youtube-embed</a> <a href="https://github.com/insin/astro-lazy-youtube-embed/releases/tag/v0.5.5">v0.5.5</a>

<li>
  <strong>2026-01-13</strong> – <a href="https://github.com/insin/tailwindcss-axes">tailwindcss-axes</a> <a href="https://github.com/insin/tailwindcss-axes/releases/tag/v2.0.0">v2.0.0</a>
  <div><em>A Tailwind CSS plugin which adds main-axis-* and cross-axis-* utilities for flexbox alignment</em></div>
  <details><summary>v2.0.0 release notes</summary><h2>Breaking</h2>
<ul>
<li>Changed <code>tailwindcss</code> peerDependency from <code>"&gt;=3.0.0 || insiders || &gt;=4.0.0-alpha.20"</code> to <code>"&gt;=3.0.0 || &gt;=4.0.0"</code></li>
<li>Removed <code>cross-axis-first-baseline</code> as it does the same thing as <code>cross-axis-baseline</code></li>
<li>Renamed <code>cross-axis-last-baseline</code> to <code>cross-axis-baseline-last</code> to match Tailwind v4</li>
</ul>
<h2>New</h2>
<ul>
<li>Added <code>main-axis-end-safe</code>, <code>main-axis-center-safe</code>, <code>main-axis-baseline</code>, <code>cross-axis-end-safe</code>, and <code>cross-axis-center-safe</code> to match Tailwind v4</li>
</ul></details>
</li>
</ul>
